BULLI COLLIERY DISASTER.

I hereby convene a PUBLIC MEETING of the ratepayers for the purpose of expressing sympathy with the widows and orphans of those who perished in

the Bulli Disaster, and to devise means for aiding the sufferers.

The meeting will be held in the Town-hall, Grey-

street, at 8 p.m. on Wednesday, the 13th inst.

F. WIMPOLE, Mayor.
